name: smudgy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a mark, etc.) having no particular shape, or without clear edges: They wear leather jackets and smudgy black eye make-up. There was a smudgy photograph, apparently taken at a party, which showed them together. See
smudge
More examplesFewer examplesThe mascara always gets smudgy.They worry that their fingerpints might leave smudgy marks on the glass.He pulls a satellite photo up on his screen and points to a big, dark, smudgy blob in the corner.
